reviewText: My Mom loves to watch the birds and it has such a great variety of birds for her to see  thank you .
This was recommended to me by my sister who also loves nature and birds and I love watching it. It is so relaxing and I've enjoyed it with my granddaughter also who is 4.
Although this DVD is charming for humans, I have found that my kitties love it even more!  What a nice treat for indoor cats.  My girls stay glued to the screen when this is on.
